reviews.review: I had very high expectations from this movie which I'm glad to say this movie exceeded in every way. The pacing of the movie was absolutely incredible. Even with so many characters and so much action set pieces the movie didn't felt bloated one bit. I was worried about the movie after watching the awful Black Panther but thankfully this movie was great.

Too spread out to actually draw you into the story much. They seemed to go for the cheap emotional sucker punch in place of actual plot or character development throughout most of it, which for me at least, backfired and left me feeling detached from every character.
To many characters.   Loved the actors but not the story.   Booed the ending in mind only.

An amazing comic movie that does what no one thought the company would have the balls to do. The characters all get just enough screen time and the action and comedy balance is perfect for a serious comic turned movie  like this.
After 10 years of watching theses amazing movies i have been blessed with another blockbuster hit that did nothing but deliver one of their best work yet

Eu, que tinha uma expectativa não muito alta para o filme, me surpendi positivamente olhando em contexto geral. Dois pontos para ressaltar que não apreciei foram alguns momentos que tentaram encaixar algumas piadas mas ao meu ver não agregaram em nada e não achei muito convincente a motivação do vilão. Mas saí do cinema feliz com o conjunto da obra.

Epic movie. Everything I could have ever want and more in the movie that all of the MCU films in the past 10 years have been leading up to. Every single scene either gave me chills, put me on the edge of tears, or made me want to jump out of my seat in excitement. There are a few plotholes, but overall I think the directors did a great job of putting dozens of characters together to form an intense, yet emotional superhero movie. Probs gonna watch it again and I would definitely recommend anyone to go see it.
This was jaw-dropping from the first minute to the insane end. Instantly one of my top 3 Marvel movies. Can't wait to see it again.

This is an amazing movie. It's my favorite so far in the MCU, with incredible dramatic moments, characters, fight scenes, and surprises. It far surpasses Avengers and Avengers: Age of Ultron. It's also a rare example of a film for which I had very high expectations going in and I left with those expectations exceeded.
